column4: hi all, recently changed my GC from a NVIDIA 6800 to a AIT 9800 , there is a graphics program that I use , when i compile it now it is unable to find libGL and does not compile the opengl bit of the program, anyone have any ideas what I am missing
are you using the open source driver or fglrx?
but do you have xorg-driver-fglrx-dev installed?
